notes: Amtreadan: GAL-IM (fortress) + ER (dark) + RAV (magic) = Fortress of Dark Magic
Amtreadan: GAL-IM (fortress) + VIR (guard) = Fortress of the Guard
Small folk who live in hillside burrows
Ancient king who cut the Ring
Order of wizards (Enym: Council of Mages)
Hobbit term for old useless things
Immortal, graceful, magical beings (Enym elven race)
Amtreadan: GAL (region) + ER (mystery) + TRA (cold) = misty cold region
Amtreadan: TRA (frozen) + SHA (barrier) + NIS (divide) = frozen divide
Amtreadan: SUN (sea) + IM (great) + Æ (intensifier) = great sea
Amtreadan: A (negate) + LIN (forest) + GAL (region) = treeless region
Amtreadan: GAL-EL (city) + SUN (sea) + IST (motion/west) = city of western sea
Amtreadan: GAL-EL (city) + FER (dawn) + SUN (sea) = city of dawn sea
Amtreadan: GAL (region) + SUN + IST = western sea region
Amtreadan: SUN + IST + OR (place) = western sea place (island name for Oldshore)
Old English style: Annor- (echo of original) + -burh (fortified place)
Amtreadan: NIS (pass) + VER (bird) + IM (high) = Eagles' Cleft
Amtreadan: NIS (pass) + ER (dark) + TRÆ (shadow) = Pass of Shadow
Ancient Human style: king of Aranada
Amtreadan: GAL (area) + IM (elevated) = fortress/fortified place. New prefix for fortresses.
